title: Lembayung Senja
overview: Pak Ki returns to his village after 35 years to atone for his past sins, but unknowingly falls in love with the son of the man he once killed. Sukma, meanwhile, cares deeply for Pak Ki without knowing the truth. When the secret is revealed, love is tested and vengeance ignites. All Pak Ki longs for is forgiveness before death comes for him.
